Articles.Content:
Is there any way of making the Electric Charge flow to display on Non-solar panel items ?
Such as the PUK Generator ? and other generators such as the Fuel Cell ?
Right now they only show efficiency, although solar panels will say "Energy Flow: 37.55"

I'd like a few parts I am moding to be able to display how much power they output at all times.

Thanks for any help !

Off the top of my head, the only thing I can think of is "hideFlow = false" but I think that's just for resource transfer flow. I looked through the CFG File Documentation  and the Module wiki documentation briefly, but didn't see anything else.

Admittedly, not the best answer, but I just hate seeing a question go unresponded to.

Cheers.
